!Quartermaster: So that you sent to us in support of Aden? Our Vanguard Aden sent to observe the invasion resurrected monstroa Shilen occurring in the vicinity of the cemetery of Aden and Forbidden Gates. Head Vanguard with Adolf subordinates is now trying to block the cave from which the monsters come out in droves. Good that you came. After all, now I need so much help!
